mapper.select: select * from article a,user b,article_column c where toped = 1 and a.user_id = b.user_id and a.column_id = c.column_id order by a.created_time desc
select a.*, b.name, c.column_name from article a,user b,article_column c where a.user_id = b.user_id and a.column_id = c.column_id and article_id = #{articleId} order by a.created_time desc
select * from article where created_time between current_date()-7 and sysdate() order by comments_num desc limit 0, #{pageSize};
